title: Text → Hexadecimal
description: Turn text into bytes with the chosen encoding and show them as hexadecimal.

parameters.label: Encoding
parameters.help: Choose the character encoding used to move between text and bytes.

parameters.label: Error mode
parameters.help: How to handle characters that do not fit. Strict stops and shows an error. Replace uses "?" or U+FFFD. Ignore skips them.

parameters.label: Uppercase hexadecimal
parameters.help: Use uppercase A-F in hexadecimal output, for example "4F" instead of "4f".

parameters.label: Byte separator
parameters.help: Add a separator between bytes, for example space gives "41 42" and empty gives "4142".

title: Hexadecimal → Text
description: Read hexadecimal bytes and turn them into text with the chosen encoding.

parameters.label: Encoding
parameters.help: Choose the character encoding used to move between text and bytes.

parameters.label: Error mode
parameters.help: How to handle characters that do not fit. Strict stops and shows an error. Replace uses "?" or U+FFFD. Ignore skips them.

parameters.label: Strict hexadecimal validation
parameters.help: When on, only hexadecimal characters are allowed and the digit count must be even.

title: Text → Binary
description: Turn text into bytes with the chosen encoding and show them as binary.

parameters.label: Encoding
parameters.help: Choose the character encoding used to move between text and bytes.

parameters.label: Error mode
parameters.help: How to handle characters that do not fit. Strict stops and shows an error. Replace uses "?" or U+FFFD. Ignore skips them.

parameters.label: Group size (bits)
parameters.help: Group bits for readability. 8 gives "01000001" and 4 gives "0100 0001".

parameters.label: Group separator
parameters.help: Add a separator between bit groups. Space gives "0100 0001" and empty gives "01000001".

title: Binary → Text
description: Read binary bytes and turn them into text with the chosen encoding.

parameters.label: Encoding
parameters.help: Choose the character encoding used to move between text and bytes.

parameters.label: Error mode
parameters.help: How to handle characters that do not fit. Strict stops and shows an error. Replace uses "?" or U+FFFD. Ignore skips them.

parameters.label: Strict binary validation
parameters.help: When on, only 0 or 1 is allowed and the bit count must fit full bytes.
